div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1675 Egypt, c. 1912 Burial: 300 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 34 AR Ptolemy I: tetradr. (Alexander hd./Athena as Svoronos 107-8, 113, 118, 125, 127, 142, 146, 148, 153, 162, 164, 168, 170, 174) Disposition: New York 31 Note by E. T. Newell in ANS
